name: fictionalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of writing about a real event or character, but adding imaginary details and changing some facts, or a story written in this way: the weekly fictionalization of his adventures Readers of the books are forced to differentiate between facts and fictionalizations. See
fictionalize
More examplesFewer examplesHer text is an elaborate fictionalization of real events.The film uses facts that are more or less accurate (though it includes two major fictionalizations along the way).This fictionalization of the case will be read in the future as much for its social history as its compelling story.
